text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump OMG  Poor Trumpers it must be so painful and traumatic having the monuments to Traitors desecrated.  The stress that you must be suffering...and to think people want you to  think about all the people dying of coronavirus when MAGIC will fix that problem for you!
